title: DataStream: Real-time Log Delivery for All Akamai Customers
description: We are pleased to announce that DataStream 2 is now available for all our customers. DataStream 2 provides customers with detailed log data from requests on the Akamai Intelligent Edge Platform within minutes. DataStream 2 gives customers unparalleled visibility into events at the Akamai edge and puts developers first by empowering them with the data needed to support critical operations.
author: Trevor Blackford
